uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique identity for this identity object.

label.title: Label
label.description: Optional label useful for non-standard identities to give a bit more context.

key.title: Key
key.description: Uniquely classify this identity using a key instead of a code.

type.title: Type
type.description:
The type of Code being represented and usually specific for
a particular context, country, or tax regime, and cannot be used
alongside the key.

code.title: Code
code.description: The actual value of the identity code.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description adds details about what the code could mean or imply

Identity.description: Identity is used to define a code for a specific context.
